name: ssopab2dv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wss(copab(s0, s1, w1), copab(s0, s1, w2)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wss(copab(s0, s1, w1), copab(s0, s1, w2)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w1, w2))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(copab(s0, s1, w1), copab(s0, s1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w1, w2))))
-| wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w1, w2))), wss(copab(s0, s1, w1), copab(s0, s1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(copab(s0, s1, w1), copab(s0, s1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w1, w2))))
-| wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w1, w2))), wss(copab(s0, s1, w1), copab(s0, s1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w1, w2))))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(copab(s0, s1, w1), copab(s0, s1, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w1, w2))), wss(copab(s0, s1, w1), copab(s0, s1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

body.origin: |- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w1, w2))), wss(copab(s0, s1, w1), copab(s0, s1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(copab(s0, s1, w1), copab(s0, s1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

comment: Inference of ordered pair abstraction subclass from implication. (Contributed by NM, 19-Jan-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2014.)
